   ayamapi darśapaurṇamāsottaraṃ kartavya ityuktaṃ"darśapaurṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā	ayam api darSa pOrNamAsa uttaram kartavyaH iti uktaM"darSa pOrNamAsAByAm izwvA
   somena yajeteti vacanāt /	somena yajeta iti vacanAt /
   ayamutsargaḥ /	ayam utsargaH /
   somādhāne darśapaurṇamāsebhyaḥ pūrvamapi tasya karaṇāt /	soma ADAne darSa pOrNamAseByaH pUrvam api tasya karaNAt /
   āśvalāyanenāpi"prāgapi somenaikena"ityanena darśapaurṇamāsebhyaḥ pūrvamapi	ASvalAyanena api"prAk api somena ekena" iti anena darSa pOrNamAseByaH pUrvam api
   somakartavyatākathanācca /	soma kartavya tA kaTanAt ca /
   etacca vasante 'pi parvaṇi kāryaṃ yadiṣṭyetivacanāt /	etat ca vasante api parvaNi kAryam yat izwyA iti vacanAt /
   kālāntaramaṇyāha baudhāyanaḥ  	kAla antara maNI Aha bODAyanaH  
   āmāvāsyena haviṣeṣṭvā nakṣatre veti /	AmAvAsyena havizA izwvA nakzatre vA iti /
   asyārthaḥ paśukālanirūpaṇe pratipāditaḥ /	asya arTaH paSu kAla nirUpaNe pratipAditaH /
   iti somakālaḥ /	iti soma kAlaH /
   pratyāśaṃ parivarddhate 'rthijanatādainyāndhakārāpahe	pratyASam parivardDate arTi jana tA dEnya anDakAra apahe
   śrīmadvīramṛgendradānajaladhiryadvakracandrodaye //	SrImat vIra mRgendra dAna jala DiH yat vakra candra udaye //
   rājādeśitamitramiśraviduṣastasyoktibhirnirmite	rAja AdeSita mitra miSra viduzaH tasya uktiBiH nirmite
   granthe 'sminsamayaprakāśanaparaḥ pūrttiṃ prakāśo 'gamat //	granTe asmin samaya prakASana paraH pUrttim prakASaH agamat //
   iti	iti
   śrīmatsakalasāmantacakracūḍāmaṇimarīcimañjarīnīrājitacaraṇakamalaśrīmanmahārājādhirājapratāparudratanūja  śrīmanmahārājamadhukarasāhasūnucaturudadhibalayavasundharāhṛdayapuṇḍarīkavikāsadinakara	SrImat sakala sAmanta cakra cUxAmaNi marIci maQjarI nIrAjita caraNa kamala SrImat mahA rAja aDirAja pratApa rudra tanUja   SrImat mahA rAja maDukara
   śrīvīrasiṃhadevodyojita 	SrI vIra siMha deva udyojita
